game_description: Welcome to Babbling Baboons! Inspired by Gorilla Tag, use your hands to move and be baboon :), play with friends, goof around with the mirror, camp in the cave, hike up the very tippy top of the tallest mountain, swim around in the sea, and have a blast playing!
